writer.name: 布拉尼斯拉夫·努希奇 Branislav Nušić

introduction: The film is a combination of two comedies of Branislav Nusic - "deceased" and "Ozaloscena family." After knowing that the woman cheating, engineer Maric, with the idea to make samubistvo, leaving the house. After his funeral, his wife and her lover counterfeit Testament and thus failing to inherit the entire property of the deceased. After a few years, the deceased back, but his bereaved family accuses of espionage and all obevestavaju police.Maric learned to be his wife Rina cheats with his best friend lawyer Novakovic. With suicidal intentions Maric leaving the house. On a large funeral unesrecenu Rinu adheres faithfully Novakovic, in pogrebnoj processional there is a bunch of different types, who are trying to proof his close relationship with the rich dead, nadajuci that will come in a part of nasledstva. But at the cemetery comes to heavy discussions, and the evening the same day, "bereaved families" plunder the house dead, while his wife and her lover falsifikuju testament, so the two of them have the whole property. Thanks imanju acquired in such a way, Novakovic and Agotanovic, sreski chief retired, which is when the falsification pomgao probate, very profitably established company. Three years later, just when it should have uspesi enterprises to be crowned a great job, pronosi the news that the late Maric appeared in the city ... The film by comedy "bereaved families" and "deceased" Branislav Nusic.
